message:
Windows 7 Tips And Tricks
Do any one knows that when pressing shift key and then right click over any folder the popup menu shows new command "Open Command Window Here" which will open command prompt(cmd) with default directory will be this folder
It was a tough operation in previous OSs
Thank's windows 7 :)

data.message: Yaaah we have just started, every new Windows/VS/Office edition surprises us with some 'new' features, we blog/tweet/mention it and then we discover that they are not new :)

Not just Command Window, as a web developer if you want to add the folder as a site  to the web matrix imagine how many folders containing web pages much easier to open also you can open the folders as a separate process too.
